# GettingStartedInputFile.tcl -- Gravity Loads

__NOTOC__ ```Tcl

  1. GRAVITY LOADS ---------------------------------------

addLoadData LoadLabel DL1; # DeadLoad Gravity Load addLoadData LoadDescription "Default Weight" addLoadData LoadTypeLabel Gravity addLoad addLoadData LoadLabel DL2; # DeadLoad Gravity Load addLoadData LoadDescription "Modified Weight" addLoadData LoadTypeLabel Gravity addLoad addLoadData LoadLabel LL1; # LiveLoad Gravity Load addLoadData LoadDescription "Live-Load Weight" addLoadData LoadTypeLabel Gravity addLoad

```
